website_summaries.verdict: An economical option that showcases multiple features and accessories at a fair price point.
pros: Steel framework provides for durable construction
Fan produces cool air as you ride for comfort
The impressive LCD monitor makes workouts and intervals easily customizable and visible
cons: Some buyers have problem with belt breaking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Home gym bike! Half the price of others
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike PROS Easy to assemble 10 mins of work will make you sweat Love the console, allows you to reset a workout, temp and time of day Maneuverability is awesome, two front wheels make it easy to move around the house Parts are easy to fit but so far a year down with daily use and no complaints CONS Range of motion seems limited compared to other brands such as Assault bike but half the price Seat is a bit uncomfortable but overtime you get used to it Awesome home gym assault bike as an alternative to big name bikes used in CrossFit gyms
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing burn
customer_reviews.text: I know it has been just a couple of days since i got this, but I could not resist posting. I am loving how this is kicking my ass in just 15 minutes of HIIT. I have tried all sorts of cardio equipment, rowers, vertical climber, etc. but this is my favorite by far. I will be updating this review in terms of durability. So far looking good. Update: In terms of adhering to using this as part of a HIIT workout, I have got to say this is now an indispensable part of my routine.
customer_reviews.author: su anon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, take it from a not so gifted “assembler”, you do NOT need the added professional installation. The instructions are the best, most step by step I have come across. Took me an hour tops. In terms of quality, back in my gym heyday, I used a lot of equipment. This is sturdy and meets gym quality. Too soon to tell if anything down the road will need repair, but am counting on that 2 year warranty that comes with bike One con is motion range of the bars, but not so bad to reduce rating. The range is good, but just not like some other longer motion range fan bikes I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.  Poor craftsmanship and extremely long warranty waits
customer_reviews.text: After just a couple of months of regular use, the pedal fell off. The movement of the pedal had stripped the threading of the crank that connects to the body of the bike. I requested a new crank from their customer service, and they shipped me two new pedals, despite my clear description of the part needed (and a photo). Took them 2 emails and over a month to get back to me that the crank is out of stock until next year, and they’d ship me a new one at that point. If it comes right away, I will have been out of commission for about 5 months. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Spastic Wookiee

customer_reviews.title: The best home air bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite piece of equipment in my home gym, I’m so glad I bought it. It allows for a solid cardio workout that is both low impact and time efficient. I’m able to get my heart rate up without pounding the pavement. I enjoy doing HIIT intervals and longer, steady state cycles. The bike itself is comparable to the ones at my gym, at a fraction of the cost of the name brand models. The seat is comfortable and the bike feels sturdy, even when I’m pedaling at my max effort. I would highly recommend this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, sturdy bike. It was easy to assemble with the tools that came with it. I'm liking the workout and finding it harder than I imagined when I speed up the pedalling (which is how it's supposed to be). The size works for me, I'm 5'2" and can reach the full extent of the handles which was a concern of mine while choosing an air bike. It is a little loud, it sounds like a window fan, but that's to be expected and I can still hear my tv if I need/want to. I'm very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone looking for a well built affordable air bike for home use.
customer_reviews.author: kat432

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful exercise bike.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to tone my arms and legs. After using it I realized it worked to for my waist also. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette C.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect Garage Gym Fan Bike
customer_reviews.text: Overal really love this bike. It's part of my garage gym and takes up minimal space. The only reason to go 4 instead of 5 is doesn't always feel the sturdiest. I feel like I have to be careful when sprinting which I'd rather hear go crazy. At the same time I suppose this prevents bad form so I'm okay with it. So if you a CrossFit style garage gym I'd buy this bike. I know I would buy it again in a heartbeat. You absolutely can't beat the price and the quality overall is good and will probably last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bad bike, even worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bike clicks excessively, some of the parts come undone as you use it, the right arm wobbles back and forth and all of the stickers are peeling off. Not to mention a few of the plastic parts came in broken. I was so excited about putting this together that I threw away the box prior to using it and I have tried contacting Marcy/Impex to send me out an empty box to mail it back in but have not heard a word back. They won’t respond to my service ticket or emails and are not answering the phone. I am guessing I’ll be stuck with this item since I have no way to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: NewYorkShopper

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, but seat post was not properly drilled out.  POOR QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived in two days, as promised. Assembly was not overly complicated, in fact they even provide the tools needed. Near the end of the assembly, while attempting to mount the seat to the seat post, I noticed the post only had two of the three mounting holes properly drilled out. I even tried using a punch to loosen the cap, but all that did was make the seat mount start to bend. I called the company and they are sending a new seat post. So I will have to wait a week before I can actually try the bike. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech Service!
customer_reviews.text: I've always watched MMA fighters use this tiny little bike to build their cardio up. Now I see why! Whew, 10 minutes on this bad boy will leave feeling as if you was running. The tech that came to set is up was very polite and fast! Within 30-45 min I was able to get a great workout in! I'm 245lbs and this machine can deal with the weight! Im definitely ordering more equipment from Marcy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this bike! It was easy to assemble but save yourself the frustration and use your own tools instead of the multitool supplied. The foot print of the machine is great. Doesn't take up too much room. With the wheels on the front of the machine it is very maneuverable even on carpet. The seat is a good size and shape if a bit hard. We purchased the shearling seat cover and recommend it. Operating the controls was easy. So far the machine has been a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Piocheguy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control and even worse customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bike was easy to assemble and worked as advertised, but I’m getting a terrible clicking noise from the fan even though I can’t see anything being hit. It’s loud enough to be actively annoying and when I start pedaling faster it’s too loud to even think Terrible customer service from the manufacturer. They were impossible to contact and even sent the Amazon agent to a voicemail. Thankfully Amazon did make the return process as painless as possible but I will be staying away from anything this brand makes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Barely suitable as a warmup bike
customer_reviews.text: If you are at all in shape, this bike will be nothing but a disappointment: The wheel is far too small to provide meaningful resistance and the range of motion on the handles is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessfan

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid bike and easy to assemble by myself in about an hour
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid bike and easy to assemble by myself in about an hour. The seat is comfortable and I get a good workout with arms and legs and core. I don't mind the white noise, but I do use headphones to listen to podcasts or news while I pedal. Its airy, but the wind does not blow right in my face. Computer is simple and I track my time, distance and calories. I'm glad I got a bike with footrests, many don't have them. When my legs get tired, I use arms alone and vice versa. The footrests are great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the workout is really good but what good is the fan if i i'm not feeling the air? The seat is tilted to far forward with no way of adjusting the metal frame, I've tried placing and taping my own cusion but it's still uncomfortable and creates pain on the lower back to hold myself on the seat. I wouldn't recommend this product unless they fixed a better seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: COMPUTER PANEL DOES NOT HAVE THE ON/OFF BUTTON.
customer_reviews.text: We would think that the most basic function of any electronic device is the ON/OFF SWITCH, yet the LCD screen that comes with our newly purchased Impex Deluxe Fan Bike AIR-1 does not have one! We would have to remove the batteries after every work-out in order to turn off the LCD screen! Other than that, the bike is easy to assemble, it’s sturdy, comfortable during work-out sessions. It arrived quickly (in 2 days) and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully low-tech!
customer_reviews.text: We had a treadmill, but it took up half our basement, was impossible to move, and finally broke down after a year and a half. My husband had used a fan bike at physical therapy and felt like it gave him a workout, and I liked the fact that it was unlikely to break down and was small and portable. I worried that without resistance settings it would be too easy for me, but not in the least -- I was out of breath within minutes, and it took me weeks to work up to the 30 minutes I currently do. Alternating this with my exercise video, I'm feeling about as strong and healthy as I ever have.
customer_reviews.author: J. Caritas

customer_reviews.title: Well made air bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my home gym. a well made air bike, I am a tall man 6" 4" 230 lbs and this bike fits me. I seen that their are more costly models out there. but I was able to get this bike and a 40" TV for the cost of some other models. Now I have a nice budget friendly home gym. Marcy makes great home gym product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth Evora

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun reattaching bike pedals
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bike for almost 2 months, I enjoyed it the first month but if you use it on a daily basis you will see the rapid deterioration of it especially with the pedals. The pedals you have to turn just right in order to get them in straight otherwise you are left with wobbly pedals, and trust me many of times I biked with the wobbly pedals just out of pure frustration to try to get the pedals on straight. This may be a decent bike for those who do lighter and not so fast workouts, but if you pedal hard don't bother with this bike. Your enjoyment will quickly turn into anger.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Exercising in A/C!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast and in excellent condition. My husband had no trouble assembling the bike, and I have lost no time in using it. ;-) Works great. You can't really work both your arms AND your legs at the same time -- it's either one or the other. (I hadn't quite understood that from the reviews. Basically, your arms CAN be going while your legs are, but only one or the other will be benefitted.) Great product. I live in SW Florida where the heat is too oppressive for outside exercise 9-10 months out of the year (IMHO). With this fan bike I can exercise under A/C!
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Kicks Butt
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble. We bought this for our small apartment during the pandemic since we can’t use our gym. It’s light enough to move around (with front wheels that make lugging it easier). It doesn’t take up much space, and, most importantly, kicks your butt! I don’t know if we will keep or sell when things are back to normal and we have gym access again, but we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leto Jane

customer_reviews.title: Fan belt failure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for a different piece of cardio equipment to try. I purchased it due to the large amount of positive reviews here on Amazon. The main negative reviews all dealt with the fan belt coming off, but there didn't seem to be that many. Well, I got one of the duds. Within about 5 minutes into the first workout the fan belt slipped right off the pedal crank. I had to take part of the bike apart in order to get the belt realigned. About 4 minutes into the next workout, the same problem. I have a help ticket in with the company now, but for a $300 piece of equipment I'm not satisfied yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT alternative for Assault Bike
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY AN ASSAULT BIKE!!!! Save hundreds and buy this instead. I am an 5-10, 200lb at home crossfitter and this has stood the test. I bust out 10 cals in 35 seconds over and over again, going as hard as I can and this has held up great. I did a lot of research because I couldn't bring myself to spend $1000 on an assault bike, and this was the answer. I GUARANTEE that this bike will meet all of your expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have both been using this bike regularly for about a month. It’s a great workout (intervals = death) and feels sturdy. We haven’t had any issues with it wobbling or feeling like parts are loose. It is about as loud as any other air bike, which is expected. I’m so glad that we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed when I received this item was the "Made in China" label. The weight if the box had me second guessing that assumption and after 3 weeks of steady use, I would most definitely buy it again. This thing is very solidly built and will last a very long time. I gave it only 4 stars as I wish the fan would blow my way a bit more, and the electronics, especially in this day and age could be a bit more sophisticated. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roliver747

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this product 19 months, less than 2 years, and it’s broken already. The cable from the petal to the fan is broken. Very disappointment. I’ve only recently started really using it since I can’t go to the gym now because of COVID. I’m not sure how I’m going to work out now especially since it’s so hot out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to higher priced equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike about three months ago, and since then I've lost 25 pounds and have tightened up my legs, shoulders, back, and arms. If you don't have the money to spend on an AirDyne, this is a great lower cost alternative. Can't recommend it enough, although I do suggest taking the tools that they include and throwing them away (although I can't remember a time when I've ever had tools come with a product that are anything other than worthless).
customer_reviews.author: Joel Neely

customer_reviews.title: so I would say I'm doing pretty good and this bike is helping
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding this Bike ever since I got it, and with dieting I've lost 10 lbs in 2 weeks. I ride it a half hour every day and all I have to do it tighten up a couple of big bolts in the front that wobble loose from using the arms back n forth. I'm 6'4", and I weighed 267lbs when I started riding it. When I weighed myself yesterday I weighed 256.8, so I would say I'm doing pretty good and this bike is helping, and it's helping with my stamina! I live out in the country and I can walk out to the mailbox now with out gasping for a bottle of oxygen, lol!
customer_reviews.author: rickkirk

customer_reviews.title: defective display
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with arthritis in my knees and hips. The bike went together easily, is very solid (it weighs 80#), and is comfortable to ride. My only problem is the display would not work at all. I called the company and they said they would send me a replacement display. Then I got an e-mail that it was on 6-8 week back order. The bike still works, but the display should provide valuable information to help keep me motivated and able to monitor my progress. Spend the extra $80 bucks or so and buy a Schwinn Airdyne. You will be happier and it should be easier to resell when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: fantastic workout. Didnt want to invest in one of the higher end models because it seemed like way too much as I wasnt sure if my wife and I would use it enough for the cost. But for the cost of this thing it is well worth it and really pushes you. The fact that it goes as hard as you push it is really amazing and unlike any other type of machine.
customer_reviews.author: T Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Returned the bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was relatively easy to assemble but within the first 10 seconds of using it, the belt came off. My husband put it back on, not a simple process, and the same thing happened. He fixed it again and the belt came off a third time. We gave up and returned the bike. We now have a bike with a chain drive instead of a belt. The new bike works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Yessss nice bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bike was very easy to assemble. Very nice. Fan blows powerfully. It has a digital display. The seat is comfortable everything about it is nice. No complaints exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: mmanderson8

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. I am a crossfitter and wanted an assault bike for home use. This bike fulfills my needs for home use and isn't extremely big and clumpy. It fits well in our bedroom. It's smooth but can be a little loud as to be expected with an air bike. Kind of sounds like real heavy rain hitting the roof to me. With headphones you don't hear it. Also I am a big girl so for those concerned about the size support, it is very sturdy and will support some good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Y.F.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Put together by myself: would have been easier with another. Well thought out instructions and parts are listed by steps so a bunch of parts aren't laying on the floor. Seat isn't that comfortable. It feels sturdy and gives me a hard workout. I bought this because of my age and knees, do not regret.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Can't give lower than one star
customer_reviews.text: Product damaged through shoddy workmanship and assembly could not be completed. Right front frame leg bent so that it flattened out rather than curved where it attaches to base. Left pedal or left crank not threaded correctly such that pedal could not be attached. Item returned. Do not plan to order another Marcy product
customer_reviews.author: Alan Scott

customer_reviews.title: way beyond expectations....
customer_reviews.text: This product amazed me from the start. Assembly was reeeeeediculously easy. What a joy. After a month of use I'm beginning to think this is the biggest bang for the buck in the history of stationary bikes. For those of you who don't know.. fan bikes are very simple so there is very little to go wrong if they are made right. And this one seems made like a tank. I've had very expensive high end gear. So I'm no rookie. This bike perfectly designed for comfort and durability. Marcy has covered every base! Enough rambling.. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: slow customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wrong screws sent for seat. Still waiting on replacement parts which never fit to begin with. Poorly machined. Have had for almost three months, got to use about five times. When it works its a good deal for the money---when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B. Eramian

customer_reviews.title: This bike is a bunch of crap. The belt became loud and squeaky in 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a bunch of crap. The belt became loud and squeaky in 1 month. Replaced belt than it was too hard to paddle and the computer no longer tracked speed, distance or calories. IMPEX said they would send a new computer but that was a month ago. Still on back order after an entire month. I hate this bike but it's too late to return per Amazon even though I purchased it in June 2016. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Navigato

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy - there was only one part where a second ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike was shipped on time and undamaged. Set up was easy - there was only one part where a second person helped lift the bike, but a second person wasn't necessarily needed. So far it is a great exercise bike. My display panel worked, and so far my pedals have stayed intact. It's best to use this with headphones or subtitles if you want to watch anything while you bike since it is a fan. I had no problem reaching the handles and I'm about 5' 7". The seat was more comfortable than I had expected after reading reviews prior to purchasing. Will update if I notice any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good deal for the price. Delivered in a timely fashion and assembly is quite easy. Left side handle attachment becomes loose periodically, which I believe is mentioned in other reviews; say every 30min of use you need to re-tighten it. This can be done by hand, no tools needed. It doesn't much bother me since I am satisfied with the product as a whole, and I'm glad it's fixable without tools. Otherwise love this, resistance really does increase with effort, so always come out of a session feeling worked out and tired.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Great machine BUT irritating clicking noise inside hub when riding.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the air bike overall, but rated a 3 because it makes a clicking noise when used. We looked all over for something that could be hitting, but nothing. Sounds like it is inside the fin or center hub.
customer_reviews.author: PEmo

customer_reviews.title: Easy for two to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very easy to put together - took two of us about one hour after it was all removed from the packaging. I used regular tools from the garage, but the ones provided will do the job. The computer part is easy to setThe breeze from the fan is cooling and not too noisy. I watch TV while riding, and enjoy the arm exercise. At 75 yrs of age the cardio workout feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Marcy bike
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Marcy bike, but the seat was uncomfortable for me. Replaced it with a much better one, and now I can ride without discomfort. The bike is well made and so far its holding up well. I like to ride with several intervals of 20 to 30 seconds of extreme riding, and then 10 to 15 seconds of regular riding, of course a gear up and cool down of 3 to 5 minutes. I find this works better for me and makes it seem like the time goes faster! But on a lazy day, just a nice consistent pace is good too. This bike performs very well either way.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a breeze to assemble, they really packaged it in a very thoughtful way. It's super sturdy and I can tell it's built to last , easily supports me at 250 lbs, comfortable seat, interface works well.... Only criticism is that the mechanical arms could move smoother. I mean I guess that's why it's $350 and not $700 or more, but there is a little bit of a clank as opposed to a totally smooth back and fourth with the arms.... It's nothing that prevents an enjoyable and vigorous workout though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: This is the one but it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It changes my life in a way. I’ve lost 15lb in a month. I use it everyday I don’t have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sajjad Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is no assault bike, but it gets the job done. Resistance is a little light Range of motion for the arms is much shorter than the rogue or assault air bikes. All things considered you still get your sweat on!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was straight forward and easy! Tools are provided and it took minutes to put together. I read that some don’t like that it maybe a bit noisy, but it is a belt-driven fan! It will make noise. It’ll do what I need it to do! Get some cardio when ever I need to at home!
customer_reviews.author: SSgt B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bike
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a pretty good bike for the price. I did get the 3 year warranty on top of the 1 year that comes with it. I had to replace the main part of the bike where the pedals and fan is, the main body, because of a loud knocking noise that started after a few months of purchase. A replacement was sent and I switched it out. But so far everything working well but you know the old saying you get what you pay for. I ride it for 30-35 minutes. I am hoping it lasts a few years. Purchased mine in March 2018.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I agree with anyone who says that this exercise bike is not a gym-rugged piece of equipment. But for home use (I've been using it for several months now), it's more than sturdy enough. Setup from the box involved assembling a fair number of pieces, and took me about half an hour of focused work. Once assembled, however, it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Karamazov

customer_reviews.title: I like to put on the resistance and feel it but ...
customer_reviews.text: My first air bike and didn't work for me. I like to put on the resistance and feel it but you can't use this bike like that. It says the faster you pedal, the more resistance and I WAS working up a sweat but I just didn't take to it. It's also quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: LadyNeal

customer_reviews.title: BUILT LIKE A TANK
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy frame. Mediocre seat, but put gel cover over it. Packing materials excellent - well done. One person can assemble, but heavy. Best way to get box away from contents is to stand up on one end, open top and bottom of box, and slide box away from the standing-on-its-head bike (leaving packing in place), then lower bike and packing to horizontal and continue removing packing material (styro). Everything goes together well.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Seeker

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF TIME! Computer broken, and loud noise when pedaling, wasted a day setting up and breaking down to return.
customer_reviews.text: Took the time to set the bike up, which is fairly easy but took about 2 hours. The computer sensor did not work, and there was a loud noise when pedaling. Called Impex-Fitness and they stated I could 1.) attempt to rewire the unit, and lubricate the bearings inside the unit myself 2.)wait two weeks for a new base unit, 3.) return to Amazon. I didn't buy something new to fix it the day I bought it, so I decide to go with option 3 which means I have to break down the machine, figure out how to box it back up, lug the heavy box to the ups store. Very disappointed, big waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for off Mat Jiu Jitsu Cardio
customer_reviews.text: I train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and am always looking to improve my cardio when im off the mat. This bike emulates off mat grappling cardio a lot better than running on a treadmill, regardless of what running workout you are doing. Doing Tabata on this 20 seconds hard 10 second rest has really improved my gas tank when rolling live.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been a great product. We are a family of 7 and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great product. We are a family of 7 and everyone has been able to use it. With the easily adjustable seat height, it can accommodate almost any height person. The electronic screen is also very helpful, it tells you how long you have ridden, your speed, and even the calories you have burned. I especially like that it does not have to be plugged in so it can be used in any location.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable. Easy to assemble. Provides adequate resistance for moderate and intense workouts. Fits my needs. Seat can be uncomfortable after a long ride but I have never been on a bike seat that wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuy

customer_reviews.title: Product, Delivery, and Assembly couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and serves a wonderful purpose for aerobic workout. These are by far the best directions I've ever received for assembly. They even had the applicable screws taped next to the directions they applied to! Got the bike a day earlier than expected. VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER!
customer_reviews.author: S. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the bike is pretty good, However the quality of the tools that ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the bike 3-4 days a week at a moderate pace.The quality of the bike is pretty good, However the quality of the tools that come with it to assemble it are deplorable. Do yourself a favor and use your own tools to assemble and make sure you get everything tightened down well. I had a pedal come unscrewed on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic but awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my garage gym. Assembly was only a few steps. It's very basican no frills but there's nothing wrong with that. Shipping was fast, but it said it was going to be delivered every day over the weekend until it actually arrived on Monday. But other than that minor blip, I'm very satisfied with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great workout overall arms, legs, cardio
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both use it. Good cardio, arm poles give a good strength workout, combination pedal and arms nice overall cardio . So far we really feel this is the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ed W.

customer_reviews.title: So far...So good
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Slight light clanking noise from the bearings or some other rubbing with chain.. But overall it gives a great workout. Took about an hour to assemble. Looks like it will last a long time if taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Riding Experience
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the bike. He's on it twice a day since he can no longer walk with me. It was easy to assemble. Easy to move. Perfect fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Gear box noise, sent E-mail to company two weeks ago
customer_reviews.text: Good product just some noise from gear box Company said they’ll contact me about noise within 24 to 48 hours. It’s been two weeks They haven’t contacted me!
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: This Marcy beats Schwinn AD6!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Schwinn AD6 first and it came damaged. What a nightmare to send it back. The Marcy has more metal and less plastic than the Schwinn did, the body and wheel are more compact making it easier to find space for. The instructions were easy to read and made it simple to put together. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Purchased 3 months ago, will fall apart if you use it often
customer_reviews.text: Started to make an internal thumping noise inside the fan area that wasn't persistent but was often very loud after about 2 weeks of use, then unrelated to the noise one of the arms attached to the center axle fell off where the pedal and lower arm join under the seat. As long as you use it to hold laundry as most exercise equipment gets used for, your good to go, just don't plan on using it much for actually working out.
customer_reviews.author: michael h.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Exercise Bike
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality exercise bike for the money! I use mine every day for 30 min, riding 7-8 miles. I go at it pretty hard! Gives me an excellent full body work out! Seat is very comfortable. Bike is very sturdy, and digital display is easy to read while riding the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Gammon

customer_reviews.title: Solid equipment, good workout
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on several bikes in all price ranges before buying this one. It is a solid bike, very easy to assemble, with a comfortable seat. It's a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy materials and easy to assemble. When using it is not very noisy sounds like a regular fan. I can watch tv without having to crank up the volume. I purchased for my husband who weighs 285.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peche

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Fan is a little small which results in less resistance than my old (20 years) fan resistance bike and the handles have a shorter cycle; however, this was expected. Overall very good and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: HWS

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk Missing multiple parts
customer_reviews.text: Tthis is the first time I have a posted a review and I am extremely annoyed at this product. First it didn’t come with the parts to put the seat on it’s missing the nuts and washers to attach. The second thing that is wrong is the left swing handle connecting rod doesn’t even screw in because the part is to big. The right one fits perfectly fine. This is a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price airbike. It squeaks a little, can be loud, and is not the easiest to move but it's a great work out and was fairly easy to assemble. Definitely would recommend it as it feels super sturdy despite the occasional squeak from the gears. Perfect addition to a home gym without the profession gym costs.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done for the most part
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike for moderate cardio. When pushed hard, the handle bars begin to loosen. It’s good except for all out sprints. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment, awesome workout. Sturdy and we'll made. I'm a big guy at 6'3" 325 pounds and this bike is perfect for me. I love it. Seat is comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I had a hope...
customer_reviews.text: Came defective. I wasn't able to attach one pivot to the main frame. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great just what I wanted and needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great just what I wanted and needed. Very happy with this purchase, does everything the more expensive ones do Fits perfect in the corner of my study making easy to use and easy to get to. always present.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie L Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Sweating to the oldies
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it's been about 2 weeks. This machine kicks my butt. No knee or back pain when I use.
customer_reviews.author: AXEL RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike three months ago. Great bike for the price. Sturdy and easy to assemble. It will give you a good upper and lower body workout. I have heard the same knocking noise others have talked about, but can't find anything wrong. I 30-45 minute cardio workout everyday and it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: AF71

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. It was hard finding a stationary bike for someone that's over the standard 250lbs weight limit. The fan is ideal for people while exercising. Delivery was timely and putting it together took him no time at all. Very sturdy and safe. Well worth the price. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this exercise bike. It was a breeze to assemble and quite sturdy. I ridden it for a few months now (approx. 40 minutes a day) and have no complaints. Yeah, it makes a little wheel fan noise. So what, it's an exercise bike not a piano. You can watch TV or listen to music while riding and the air from the wheel fan helps keep you cool. My bottom line: This exercise bike offers the best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Topper

customer_reviews.title: Love my bike
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike. It does not take up much space as I have it in a corner in a spare room. Easy to assemble. I would recommend it for anyone looking to get some exercise in.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Jurena

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about this bike. It is smooth pedaling and quiet. The seat is comfy. The pedals are flat and stable. It was easy to put together. The seat post is easy to adjust for different rider heights. We have been using it for a couple weeks and are enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the monitor works, pretty unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself works but I'm extremely dissatisfied because the monitor isn't working at all. The monitor is very important with these bikes to track progress. On top of that, the Allen wrench and screws stripped way too easily during assembly, so I can't take it apart to ensure everything is connected correctly. So, I basically paid full price for half a machine
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Seat is very uncomfortable,  noise is bad.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a horrible grinding when in use. I am waiting for Marcy's to respond. They are talking about replacement.
customer_reviews.author: havttjjfxethfs as f

customer_reviews.title: Marcy is a solid bike. It's$100 to $150 less than schwinn airdye2
customer_reviews.text: Marcy is superior to the schwinn airdyne2. I sold my schwinn after 7 months. Bought the marcy. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Bob souza

customer_reviews.title: Wind does not blow to your body.
customer_reviews.text: Resistance fan flows air past the body providing a cool, comfortable feeling. The bike I received does not blow to your body, it blows to the front instead. I think they might installed the blade backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Mys

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for extreme conditioning or a light workout
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for three fight camps now and this thing really does kick your butt. Because of the fan, the harder you push, the harder it pushes back. Absolutely perfect for extreme conditioning or a light workout.
customer_reviews.author: danny santos

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Workout
customer_reviews.text: Unit is sturdy, well built easy to assemble. Much improved over the earlier models, especially the seat. Provides a very good, moderate workout for both legs and upper body. It won't prepare you for Tour de France, but will keep you in shape used regularly. It's similar to my Airdyne but smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived ahead of schedule and was easy to assemble. Works well and the only complaint is the left side foot peg will loosen. Just check it periodically and tighten as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Fan wheel was out of alignment and knocked against the metal cage. You can't ride the bike. Contacted the manufacturer and they want me to send it back to Amazon at my cost. Terrible customer service. Won't honor warrenty.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Cardio Training Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great Cardio Training & Exercise Bike. It was easy to assemble and doesn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeargyll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike! It was definitely what I wanted. I think if it had more resistance then it would have been 100000% 5Star! Just stay on longer to get a more strenuous workout. Super great and if you're 5'0 then you'll appreciate the height.
customer_reviews.author: Party Time

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.....works well.
customer_reviews.text: Had it 2 weeks and it's working fine. Assembly took about 1 hr and 15 min. Is quite and runs smoothly. Hope it continues to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas  E.

customer_reviews.title: Why buy an Airdyne?
customer_reviews.text: Love it! After selling my Schwinn Airdyne before we moved across the country I was hesitant about buying anything else. But the quality of this is about the same if not better in some areas. The only thing I don't like, the seat is pretty cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love my bike. Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike it was very easy to put together and comfortable to ride. We love that so much we bought two! One for me and one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific bike, you won't be disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: micheleB

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cardio bike
customer_reviews.text: this bike is an excellent addition to my home gym - it is available at a much lower price point than an assault bike and it’s really high quality. I’ve had it for 4 months now and have used it regularly and it appears to be very durable. It’s a great cardio workout.
customer_reviews.author: andrew schurle

customer_reviews.title: Defective left pedal
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the bike just fine. BUT The left pedal will not stay on. Maybe a stripped screw problem, but I cannot keep it attached. Started to fall off after three days but felt loose since it was assembled. Friday June 2. I cannot repack and return. Please advise. Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. (Took the wife and I about 1/2 hour). Smoothe action, comfortable and reasonably quiet.Like the pegs to place feet on if one only wants to use the arms. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dblues

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I really hope it will last it gives a great workout
customer_reviews.author: kato

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike... some issues
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise bike. Not as much air from fan as I'd like, but for the price it is a really nice deal. My only big issue (and why I gave it 3 stars) is because the screw (located on the side of the front wheel) that attaches to one of the hand levers works itself loose and has to be tightened after about 20-30 minutes of use. Not too big of a deal, but should not happen at all...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Marcy Exercise Upright Fan Bike for Cardio Training and Workout AIR-1
product_meta.description:
Engage in heart-pumping cardio training without having to leave the comforts of your home with the Marcy AIR-1 Exercise Fan Bike! Spare yourself gym membership fees and make your home your favorite place to work out with this top-quality home exercise equipment.

This Marcy exercise workout upright bike features a premium steel frame that combines design and performance. Constructed from 14-gauge steel tubing finished with scratch resistant and powder coated finish, this bike has a study structure to guarantee that it can withstand daily use. This full body workout equipment features a pair of dual-action exercise arms. Designed to simultaneously work your upper body while you pedal, allowing you to develop multiple muscle groups by exercising on this stationary bike. Also, the adjustable seat can accommodate users of various body types. The adjustable seat facilitates proper body posture and alignments during workouts, letting your exercise routines have the maximum effect on the areas that need tension and resistance.

This stationary cardio bike also comes with an innovative resistance system that utilizes a fan instead of a weighted flywheel. The fan features a unique design that offers both functionality and comfort. The resistance mechanism increases the resistance as you pedal and produces cool air to increase your comfort and endurance throughout your cardio training. Additionally, the bike’s ultra-functional LCD computer screen acts as an odometer. The state-of-the-art LCD screen has a sharp panel display and is large enough for easy visibility to tracks your time, speed, distance traveled, and calories burned.

Invest in this premium Marcy exercise machine now and experience safe and convenient cardio training without having to leave you house.





AMAZON.COM
Stay cool while working up a serious sweat with the Marcy Air 1 fan bike. The Air 1 is equipped with dual-action arms that work the upper body while the pedals work the leg muscles, giving you an efficient full body workout with every ride. Resistance comes from the built-in fan; the faster you pedal, the harder the workout. The fan doubles as a cooling agent, pushing air past your body to keep you cool while training. It's easy to monitor your workout progress thanks to the Air 1's integrated computer, which tracks your speed, time, distance, and calories burned. And the Air 1 doesn't skimp on rider comfort, with a high-density foam seat with a durable vinyl covering, foam-covered handlebars, and weighted and counterbalanced pedals with adjustable foot straps. 

 Construction-wise, the bike is made using 1-by-2.25-inch rectangular tubing and 1.25-inch round, 24-gauge steel tubing, all coated with a durable powder-coat finish. Other details include a shroud cover made of molded ABS, transport wheels for easy mobility, and a two-year manufacturer's warranty. The computer panel is battery powered and requires two AA batteries (not included).
feature_bullets: PREMIUM STEEL FRAMEWORK–This multifunctional equipment features a premium steel frame that combines design and performance. Constructed from 14-gauge steel tubing with scratch-resistant and powder coated finished, this bike boasts durability in its uses

DUAL-ACTION EXERCISE ARMS –Designed to give you an efficient and effective workout, this exercise fan bike features a pair of dual-action exercise designed to simultaneously work your upper body while targeting multiple muscle groups.

UNIQUE RESISTANCE SYSTEM– This bike comes with an innovative resistance system that utilizes a fan instead of a weighted flywheel that increases resistance as you pedal faster and produces cool air to increase comfort and endurance while you work out.

HIGH-TECH LCD MONITOR – The Marcy AIR-1 exercise fan bike has a LCD computer screen that acts as an odometer. The state-of-the-art sharp panel LCD screen displays time, speed, distance, and calories large enough for easy visibility.

ADJUSTABLE SEAT POSITIONING – This stationary bike features an adjustable seat that can accommodate users of different body types. The adjustable seat facilitates proper body form during exercises and allows the body to precisely conform to the equipment.
